'''''Mythlore'' 25''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol7/iss3/ Volume 7, Issue 3]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
==Contents==

====Articles====

* Patterson, Nancy-Lou. “An Appreciation of Pauline Baynes.”
* Walker, Steven C. “The Making of a Hobbit: Tolkien’s Tantalizing Narrative Technique.”
* Drury, Rogery. “Providence at Elrond’s Council.”
* Patterson, Nancy-Lou. “The Host of Heaven: Astrological and Other Images of Divinity in the Fantasies of C.S. Lewis (Part 1).”
* Morse, Robert E. “Rings of Power in Plato and Tolkien.”
* Schweitzer, Darrell. “The Novels of Lord Dunsany.”

====Poetry====

* Carter, Margaret L. “The Practice of Presence.”
* Egan, Thomas M. “The Midnight Realm.”
* Egan, Thomas M. “Sand Castles by the Sea.”

====Features====

* Ellwood, Gracia Fay. Editorial.
* GoodKnight, Glen H. Managing Editorial.
* Christopher, Joe R. An Inklings Bibliography (14).
* Speth, Lee. “Cavalier Treatment: Curses and Caravans.”
* Letters.

====Reviews====

* ''Lord of the Rings - Part 1 (film)''. Ralph Bakshi. Reviewed by Jessica Yates.
* ''A Reader's Guide to The Silmarillion''. Paul H. Kocher. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''Dancing in the Dragon's Jaws (album)''. Bruce Cockburn. Reviewed by Gord Wilson.
* ''Metropolis''. Thea von Harbou. Reviewed by Thomas M. Egan.
* ''One Ring to Bind Them All: Tolkien's Mythology.'' Anne C. Petty. Reviewed by Thomas Santoski.
* ''The Literature of Fantasy: A Comprehensive, Annotated Bibliography of Modern Fantasy Fiction''. Roger C. Schlobin. Reviewed by Joe R. Christopher.
* ''The Screwtape Letters''. C.S. Lewis. Illustrated by Papas. Reviewed by Kathryn Lindskoog.
